std Namespace Reference

Detailed Description

Author:
P Sajjan Raj Jain
Date:
2015/08/17
Program to illustrate Binary Indexed Tree data structure.

Binary Indexed Tree data structure provides a O(log n) solution for querying prefix sum and updating prefix sum. Input array and the array used in Binary Indexed Tree is 1-index based. Element at index 0 in both the array is dummy.
